column4: any work around for boot error     /bin/sh: can't access TTY; job control turned off

in the stricktest sense   no   but nothing including cursor input is available
but keyboard input is. did you notice any other processes running whilst in console?
sorry? which processes did you notice?
so when you said "yes" just now...
